page.title: 15EVENTS IN CUMBERNAULD
page.content: The town hosts several events. In March a{triathlon}is staged - running, cycling and swimming. 1985 saw the first{half-marathon}- 13.5 miles over the towns roads. The Scottish Milk{cycle race}is a regular feature in spring and has been held for the past five years. Since 1973 there has been a{24 hour marathon for Action Research over the town's path system. Each area has it's{Gala Day}in June, at which a pupil is crowned Gala Queen and leads a procession to the fete. The largest are in{Condorrat}and the old{Lanriggs fair}in Cumbernauld. The latter ends civic week - a feast of athletic, dramatic and cultural events, and which commemorates the town's association with Mary Queen of Scots, one of whose companions was {Mary Fleming}of Cumbernauld.
